content:
## MARKET OVERVIEW

1. What is the Current Market Regime?
RISK-ON: low volatility (Vol: 22.9%) and broad participation (Breadth: 7/8 sectors positive). Market tone is bullish with momentum concentrated in banks and cyclicals.

2. Which sectors are leading?
Banking & Finance ABOVE TREND: VAKBN (1W: +11.29% | 1M: +23.30%) ABOVE TREND, AKBNK (1W: +7.80% | 1M: +15.73%) ABOVE TREND, YKBNK (1W: +8.55% | 1M: +14.72%) ABOVE TREND. Construction & REIT ABOVE TREND: EKGYO (1W: +6.67% | 1M: +15.20%) ABOVE TREND, ENKAI (quant leader) showing strength.

3. Which sectors are lagging?
Transportation LAGGING: THYAO (1W: -0.83% | 1M: +12.41%) CORRECTION, TAVHL (1W: -4.58% | 1M: +5.86%) CORRECTION. Energy & Chemicals narrower gains with dispersion despite some leaders.

## STOCK PERFORMANCE

4. Top Performing Stocks?
VAKBN (1W: +11.29% | 1M: +23.30%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +9.93% | 1M: +18.89%) ABOVE TREND; YKBNK (1W: +8.55% | 1M: +14.72%) ABOVE TREND; AKBNK (1W: +7.80% | 1M: +15.73%) ABOVE TREND; EKGYO (1W: +6.67% | 1M: +15.20%) ABOVE TREND.

5. Worst Performing Stocks?
PETKM (1W: -1.33% | 1M: +7.37%) CORRECTION; GUBRF (1W: -1.57% | 1M: +32.38%) CORRECTION; KONTR (1W: -2.29% | 1M: +3.02%) CORRECTION; SISE (1W: -2.81% | 1M: +18.88%) CORRECTION; TAVHL (1W: -4.58% | 1M: +5.86%) CORRECTION.

6. Momentum Stocks?
VAKBN (1W: +11.29% | 1M: +23.30%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +9.93% | 1M: +18.89%) ABOVE TREND; YKBNK (1W: +8.55% | 1M: +14.72%) ABOVE TREND; AKBNK (1W: +7.80% | 1M: +15.73%) ABOVE TREND; TTKOM (1W: +6.60% | 1M: +17.18%) ABOVE TREND.

## SECTOR OUTLOOK

7. Banking Sector Outlook?
Banks leading the rally; prioritize large-cap lenders: AKBNK (1W: +7.80% | 1M: +15.73%) ABOVE TREND, GARAN (1W: +4.27% | 1M: +9.74%) ABOVE TREND, ISCTR (1W: +2.39% | 1M: +21.72%) ABOVE TREND. Balance sheet resilience and rate outlook support further rotation into the sector.

8. Industrial Sector Outlook?
Heavy industry mixed but constructive: TOASO (1W: +6.34% | 1M: +18.78%) ABOVE TREND, EREGL (1W: +1.37% | 1M: +15.42%) ABOVE TREND, ASELS (1W: +5.53% | 1M: -7.87%) RECOVERY — watch earnings/capex signals for sustainment.

9. Energy & Chemicals Outlook?
Selective strength: TRMET (1W: +9.93% | 1M: +18.89%) ABOVE TREND, TUPRS (1W: +2.87% | 1M: -2.12%) RECOVERY, PETKM (1W: -1.33% | 1M: +7.37%) CORRECTION. Commodity price moves and FX will drive leadership within the group.

## PORTFOLIO STRATEGY

10. Portfolio Recommendation?
Risk-on stance: overweight Banking & selected cyclicals (autos, construction) and trim Transportation/weak energy names; keep some cash to add on short-term pullbacks. Stay size-aware given narrow leadership despite broad sector gains.

## NEXT WEEK OUTLOOK

11. Stocks to Watch Next Week?
VAKBN (1W: +11.29% | 1M: +23.30%) ABOVE TREND; AKBNK (1W: +7.80% | 1M: +15.73%) ABOVE TREND; TRMET (1W: +9.93% | 1M: +18.89%) ABOVE TREND; ENKAI (quant leader) (1W: strong | 1M: strong) ABOVE TREND; TOASO (1W: +6.34% | 1M: +18.78%) ABOVE TREND.

12. Sectors to Watch Next Week?
Banking & Finance and Construction & REIT for extension of the rally; Transportation for potential downside continuation or mean reversion. Monitor Energy & Chemicals for dispersion around commodity moves.

13. Key Levels & Triggers?
Watch market internals and 20-day MA behavior for signs of exhaustion; primary triggers: domestic rate commentary, FX moves, global risk sentiment and commodity price shocks. A sustained loss of the 20-day structure or weakening breadth would flip the tape from risk-on.

EXECUTIVE SUMMARY
Low-volatility, broad risk-on market led by banks and cyclicals with strong quant confirmations; VAKBN, TRMET and large banks are key leaders. Main risk: stretched positioning and a transport/energy pullback that could test breadth — manage weights and keep tactical dry powder.
